title: Phoenix Bird

adjectives: Fiery and legendary in its appearance.
verbs: Rises from ashes in a cycle of rebirth.
nouns: A symbol of hope and eternal life.

description: A mythical bird that cyclically regenerates or is otherwise born again. It symbolizes rebirth, immortality, and renewal.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the phoenix bird emoji is a majestic symbol of rebirth and resilience, depicted with vibrant, fiery plumage. Its design showcases Apple's expertise in glossy 3D shading, with each feather rendered in rich, warm tones and highlighted by realistic lighting to suggest an ethereal glow. This mythical creature, appearing powerful and radiant on Apple devices, is used to represent overcoming adversity, transformation, and enduring spirit.
